iati-activity.title: Election Results Transmission 2013-2014
iati-activity.description: This component of the electoral cycle programme aims to support the development of a national decentralized system for transmitting and collating election results.
iati-activity.participating-org: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

iati-activity.title: Election Results Transmission
iati-activity.description: The project aims to support the development of a nationally decentralized system for transmitting and collating election results as well as provide accurate and up to date information on Election Day events across the country.
iati-activity.participating-org: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

iati-activity.title: Support to 2015 Presidential Election
iati-activity.description: The Project aims at providing support for the timely and efficient, free and fair conduct of the presidential election in Zambia by supporting voter education, election day materials and alternative dispute resolution.
iati-activity.participating-org: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

iati-activity.title: Support to 2015 Election
iati-activity.description: The Project aims at providing support for the timely and efficient, free and fair conduct of the presidential election in Zambia after the demise of the late President H.E. Michael C. Sata on 28 October 2014.
iati-activity.participating-org: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
